channel.title: Outdoors on Yiyuan Fang's Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Outdoors on Yiyuan Fang's Stuff

item.title: On Falling Off the Wagon -- Reflections on Running
item.description: I got “on the wagon” in August – meaning that I’ve amped up my milage significantly, often over 120 miles per month. Two months have passed since then, and I have learned so much about my body, my own mental processes, time, dealing with others, etc etc. Here is an attempt to tell you more about running. Initial motivations and how I passed beyond that Frankly, there are two initial motivations for signing up this forthcoming race – to prove to others, and to prove to myself.
